resources.string:
Welcome to the Mobile Voting System! 
Admin Commands: 
		'init' to initialize and be admin 
		'start' to initialize tally table 
		'add name1,..,nameX' to add projects 
		'end' to end voting and display score 
Voter Commands: 
		'X' where X is the project number to vote for
You are now the admin of the Mobile Voting System.
The tally table has been initialized. Voting has commenced.
